Title: Account of Bricks
Description: Rectangular wooden writing-board with an inverted triangular protrusion at one end and a hole through the centre; inscribed in demotic: settlement of account of bricks. We can find the following names in the text: Harchebis, son of Teos; Teos; Sambathaios; Abraham
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (51438) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/51438)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
